arguments.body:
# Good morning, here's your tech briefing!

---

## 1. AI Startup Raises $50M to Accelerate Edge Computing
**Link:** https://techcrunch.com/2025/12/01/ai-startup-raises-50m
**Summary:** EdgeAI raised $50M to build ultra‑low‑latency AI models for edge devices. Their EdgeVision platform can run inference in under 10 ms while using <5 W of power. Analysts expect this to speed up AI deployment in remote and IoT environments.

---

## 2. New Zero‑Day Exploit Targets Major Cloud Providers
**Link:** https://thehackernews.com/2025/12/zero-day-cloud-exploit
**Summary:** A new zero‑day (CVE‑2025‑9876) impacts AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud, letting attackers gain privileged VM access through IAM misconfigurations and container escapes. Cloud providers are preparing patches. Meanwhile, organizations should audit IAM roles and isolate critical workloads.
